title: Broken Made Beautiful: Daily Devotions of Hope and Encouragement for the Healing Journey
description: Whether you are reeling from a recent catastrophe, seeking healing from past wounds, or collapsing under the weight of daily burdens, Allyson Long’s dynamic and warm devotional will provide strength and encouragement to you each day through the powerful and personal message of God’s Word. Filled with uplifting Scriptural truths and candid personal insights, Allyson leads you on a yearlong journey of seeking and finding God’s peace, comfort, and healing in the midst of the challenging circumstances of life.
author: Allyson Long
